creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council
description: liquor chest,1780-1800, oak bound with iron fittings; lined in paper of black and white design on blue ground; containing six large and six small square decanters with stoppers, each in a compartment; also two wine glasses, one tumbler, one cordial glass in a removable tray; colorless, non-lead glass gilded in foliage designs along shoulders of decanters, stoppers and upper half of glasses; see cat. card for ind. msmsts
title: Large decanter with stopper
